x <- seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 100)
y <- seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 100)
d1 <- expand.grid(x, y)

fxy <- function(x, y) {
  ans = (sin(2*x)+sin(2*y))/2
  return(ans)
}

fuzz <- fxy(d1$Var1,d1$Var2)


ggplot(d1, aes(Var1, Var2, fill = fuzz))+
  geom_tile()+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_fill_viridis()+
  scale_x_continuous()

e)
```{r pressure}

#need to figure out how to make the points jitter slightly 
set.seed(2)
logistic <- function(x) 1 / (1 + exp(-x))
n <- 50
df <- tibble(
  x = c(rnorm(n, -1),rnorm(n, 1)),
  p = logistic(0 + 2*x),
  y = rbinom(2*n, 1, p)
  )

ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_jitter(height=.01) + 
  stat_smooth(method = "glm", method.args=list(family = "binomial"))
```
